content: in each st around join with invj 34 round 5 chain 1 half_double_crochet double_crochet in same st skip 1 * half_double_crochet double_crochet in next st skip 1 repeat from * around join with invj 34 round 6 slip_stitch over one st chain 1 double_crochet half_double_crochet in same st skip 1 * double_crochet half_double_crochet in next st skip 1 repeat from * around join with invj 34 round 7 st st over one st chain 1 half_double_crochet double_crochet in same st skip 1 * half_double_crochet double_crochet in next st skip 1 repeat from * around join with invj 34 round 8 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st and in each st around join with invj 34 round 9 repeat round 4 round 10 repeat round 2 round 11 repeat round 3 finishing cut yarn and finish off the tail use the yarn needle on the beginning tail to complete the initial seam at the beginning row weave in end and finish off the coffee cup cozy sampler set by amy drossner copyright © may 2022 4 the droma cozy g hook and h hook 37 yards hobby lobby i love this cotton worsted weight 4 round 1 with g hook make a foundation half_double_crochet for 34 sts unstretched this should measure 7 ¾ -8 join with a slip_stitch in first st taking care not to twist the row you will complete the rest of this seam at the finishing stage round 2 change to h hook chain 1 working in flo slip_stitch in same st and each st around loosely but evenly join with invj in flo of beginning st 34 round 3 change back to g hook chain 1 single_crochet in the free unworked back loops of round 2 this will roll the sl sts from the previous round forward creating a round of raised texture join with invj 34 round 4 repeat round 2 round 5 change back to g hook chain 1 double_crochet in the free unworked back loops of round 4 this will roll the sl sts from the previous round forward creating a line of raised texture join with invj 34 round 6 chain 1 fpdc around each double_crochet post of previous round join with invj 34 rounds 7-11 repeat round 6 round 12 repeat round 2 round 13 repeat round 3 round 14 repeat round 2 round 15 repeat 3 finishing cut yarn and finish off the tail use the yarn needle on the beginning tail to complete the initial seam at the beginning row weave in end and finish off the coffee cup cozy sampler set by amy drossner copyright © may 2022 5 the valuri cozy g hook 31 yards hobby lobby i love this cotton worsted weight 4 round 1 make a foundation half_double_crochet for 34 sts unstretched this should measure 7 ¾ -8 join with a slip_stitch in first st taking care not to twist the row you will complete the rest of this seam at the finishing stage round 2
